title: Ranked today:
body:
1 team gets vayne, other team loses, then repeat.
she has a 35% pick rate, (she is in over 1/3 of ALL games) there are so few games without her. What can you do? (in the current meta your team has at least 3 tanks (if not you've lost already))

i have an idea! lets get the tanks to build armour because she is AD... oh wait she does true damage

Lets build health instead of armour then!... oh wait her true damage does percentage health damage and her core item is Bork

i know! lets build more damage than her to kill her before she kills us... oh wait she has the highest damage output in the game.

Alright then.. we cant tank her damage and we cant kill her, lets run away... oh wait she has a large move speed bonus and a 2 second cooldown dash, and a stun.

Ok... the only option we have is to make sure we focus her in teamfights... oh wait her ult lets her go invisible every 2 seconds for 1 second during a dash, no one knows where she is or where she is going to be.

the only way to kill her is to have an assassin focus her, but in this tank meta assassins are so useless at anything other than killing the adc, and if you have an assassin the likelihood is that you sacrifice one of your 3 tanks which means you cant do anything against their 3 tanks, so you cant do that either.


In other words she is an adc who moonlights as an assassin that can kill tanks (already suspect) who also has a 2 second damage enhancing dash, invisibility a large movespeed bonus and a stun...

Lucian has a 14 second cool down dash with no cc

Kog'maw has percentage damage, on a cooldown, and has a slow

Graves has a 14 second cooldown dash, and a slow

Ezreal has an 11 second cooldown dash and no cc

Draven has a slight knock back and a move speed bonus on a cooldown 

Vayne has a 2 second cooldown dash, a stun, a passive movespeed bonus, invisibilty, and percentage damage with no cooldown or mana cost. also her damage output is greater than all the others.

my question is why?

replies.body: Are you implying Vayne is OP?
nah she's just pubstomp in low elo

vaynes very op but try playing her. correctly she requires insane mechanics and with peel is completely unkillable with 3-4 big items no other adc can do what she does u need to completely shut her down early (she loses to every adc inlane hard) but if she keeps up in cs and is allowed to free farm your gonna lose.
u just bait ur team let enemy blow all cds and u clean up everytime :) nothing counters her just poor positioning or being caught out

Fyi Vayne is not the ADC with highest damage output but Kogmaw is the one with the highest DPS. To counter her true damage get  {{item:3110}} {{item:3143}} for the attack speed slow or choose champions like {{champion:20}} {{champion:54}} who both have attack speed slows.Also one thing you may not notice about vayne is that she deals more physical damage than true damage and she actually need a {{item:3035}} to deal with tanks but to a lesser extend. To counter her stealth just get a {{item:2043}} {{item:3362}} . Her tumble isn't a very high range dash and only dashes for like 300 unit which is really not a lot. All the adc you mention that have a dash can dash through walls but vayne's tumble cannot go through walls except some very very thin ones and its not easy to tumble through even the thinnest wall in the game as vayne. She also have terrible laning phase and extremely bad wave clear and she have no aoe spells and all her skills are short ranged which is why she need a short CD dash to make up for her lack of range on her skills and auto attacks. Lucian's dash may have a 14s CD but actually thats a lie because your Q, your W and even your ult will reduce the cooldown of it meaning it is actually on a very short CD just like vayne's Q. Lucian just like Vayne is short range and he have a low CD dash. Do you see the similarities ? One last thing that i want to say is that why not just ban her in ranked if you don't want to deal with her ....

TLDR : Vayne not Op and have counters.

Vayne currently has a 51% winrate and its falling HARD! - last week she had a 54.6% winrate. She has droped from 2nd place to 5th 

the shift in the meta is forcing more early pressure which the tank meta allowed her to farm in.

this is allowing other adcs to come up and actually dominate.

Your top 3 adc's are:

1. Sivir
2. Ashe
3. Jinx

These are your 3 queens

interestingly tho draven is rising in the ranks, he absolutely crushes vayne in laning phase. he has risen 3 ranks and is now higher on the ladder then vayne with a 52% winrate and climbing.

> Ok... the only option we have is to make sure we focus her in teamfights... oh wait her ult lets her go invisible every 2 seconds for 1 second during a dash, no one knows where she is or where she is going to be.

LMFAO have you never heard of a pink ward? Or oracles?
{{item:3364}} {{item:2043}} 

> Lucian has a 14 second cool down dash with no cc
>Graves has a 14 second cooldown dash, and a slow
>Ezreal has an 11 second cooldown dash and no cc

Literally all these dashes have built in ways to reduce the cooldown.

Lucian doubleshot reduces the cooldown by 2-4 seconds. So he can get it down to a 2-4 second cd.
Gaves dash has a 1s reduced CD for EVERY auto attack.
Ezreal Q reduces his dash CD by 1s for every Q.

Her true damage is based on your max HP, so yeh... {{item:3075}} + {{item:3110}}  still EXTREMELY effective.

Im going to take a wild guess and say you are MAX... Silver 4.

She is counterable in lane by most adc if not all, she should lose CS to a good match up therefore be behind as her range is mediocre and her poke relies on being in trading range rather than have a long range poke like corki / graves and most other adc. If she wins lane, yes you're at a disadvantage in teamfights, but she is definitely not only counterable by an assassin.
Vayne is the only champion with a defence rating for 1
When you're dealing 2500+ dps and a chunk of it is true damage while invisible to a stunned target... defence isn't your primary concern
Play Talon he fits the meta atm because he counters most mid laners and with BC his w applies it twice

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E293Xqc2,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-16T01:16:01.345+0000)
>
> Ok... the only option we have is to make sure we focus her in teamfights... oh wait her ult lets her go invisible every 2 seconds for 1 second during a dash, no one knows where she is or where she is going to be.

zone her in lane and get on top of her early

if late game she has managed to keep farming  at the expenses of mid game skirmishes (or you failed to deny her cs), upgrade your trinks or buy a pink, when she ults cc her and kill her!

The other option is to ban her, its a double win protects against horrible Vayne on your team or good enemy Vayne

Vayne has a very weak laning stage as well as a short range based auto attack, you're talking about comparing the cooldowns with cc, there is no way graves/lucian or draven will get out damaged by a vayne until the lather stages of the game. She is by far, no means broken, in fact il'd prefer versing a vayne due to her short range and weak laning stage giving your team a huge advantage to make plays in the early stages of the game, yes if she wins laning she can be a pest, but against current mid laners like viktor, azir or high burst champions she has no range at all to survive against them unless mechanically good enough to dodge all their abilities.

Every adc plays differently, otherwise it would be boring. Without a doubt vayne has the weakest early game of any adc. short range, 0 AOE abilities meaning slow clear times, and because of her core item build that eventually makes her strong in the mid/late, she has a pretty weak build path until you finish Bork. Vaynes all about making it too mid game unscathed so that she can start too snowball from there while other adc's can put on the pressure very early. 

If your losing lane to a vayne it's probably because of the support she has with her. 

And just with the dash cd times uve listed. Both graves and lucian can lower the cd of there dashes to less than vaynes (i believe graves is the most mobile adc when it comes down to it).

Draven has the most dmg early and can easily push vayne out of the lane to shut her down early. 

On top of all that vayne relies heavily on auto attacks, unlike champs like lucian. Played a game the other day where they had a nasus and a malphite, both with frozen hearts. Wither + ground slam + frozen heart meant i just got shut down, not really anything i could do about it. Im only in gold, so can't really speak for the higher tiers of players, but currently at this rating, while it does somewhat rely on the enemy comp, it's not that hard to shut down a vayne early and build against her so that she can't just tear through everyone. Exhuasting a vayne means 0 dmg from her for the next 3 seconds.

PS. With runglaive and devourer assassins are definetly starting to come back to the jungle.
Good luck, you'll be fighting 35% of the population to get her first
